name: Come Out
description:
Currently part of the Action For Trans Health pay-what-you-want bundle here!

This game purchased alone is currently marked at a price. This is to encourage downloads of the full bundle instead, for which you can choose your own price for 17 items!

All money raised from sales will go to Action for Trans Health, an organisation that campaigns for democratic trans healthcare and gives out grants to intersectionally marginalised trans people to help them with health needs.

------------------------------------

Thanks to everyone who supported the bundle, you're all wonderful! <3

A scissor-paper-rock game against a ghost in a mirror, reflecting on some of the anticipated fears I had during a lifetime of waiting to be in a safe enough place to be able to come out.

Cw perhaps for transphobic emotional abuse, also some harsh camera shake.
